snippet: A Delaware court judge said in an opinion that Delphi Financial's chief, Robert Rosenkranz, had selfishly favored his own interests in negotiating a sale of the company to Tokio Marine Financial.
abstract: A Delaware court judge said in an opinion that Delphi Financial's chief, Robert Rosenkranz, had selfishly favored his own interests in negotiating a sale of the company to Tokio Marine Financial.
